name: Webgl
body:
### Welcome to WebGL
These are some simple demo and course assignment applications for WebGL.

### Demo Applications
None. But check this out for [triangle art](https://www.pinterest.com/explore/triangle-art/). Or some [WebGL demos](http://davidwalsh.name/webgl-demo).

### Assignments
* Tesselation and Twist [here](Assignments/twist.html)

### Author
This was made by Andreas Stenmark (@astenmark).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
